sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag' import { Playground } from 'docz'; import Card from '../card.js'; import GridContainer from '../grid-container'; import GridItem from '../grid-item'; export default class MDXContent extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.layout = null } render() { const { components, ...props } = this.props return {`Card`} {`The `}{`Card`}{` component represents a card structure.`} {`Width`} {`You use a predefined size or a customizable size passing a css width to the `}{`width`}{` property :`} this card has width="xs" this card has width="sm" this card has width="md" this card has width="lg" this card has width="300px" {`Padding`} {`You can control padding in a granular fashion with the `}{`padding`}{` property :`} the default padding ispadding="1.5rem" this card has padding="10px" this card has {`padding={{left: '1rem', top: '10px'}}`} this card has {`padding={{right: '10%', bottom: '1cm'}}`} {`Playground`} I am a Card! Edit me!`} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,Card,GridContainer,GridItem}}> I am a Card! Edit me! } }
